code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{ShepherdTour,ShepherdTourContext}from'react-shepherd';import AppContent from'./content.js';import"shepherd.js/dist/css/shepherd.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var tourOptions={defaultStepOptions:{cancelIcon:{enabled:true}},useModalOverlay:true};var buttonConfig=[{classes:'shepherd-button-secondary',text:'Exit',type:'cancel'},{classes:'shepherd-button-primary',text:'Back',type:'back'},{classes:'shepherd-button-primary',text:'Next',type:'next'}];var steps=[{id:'intro',attachTo:{element:'.title',on:'bottom'},buttons:buttonConfig,highlightClass:'highlight',scrollTo:true,cancelIcon:{enabled:true},title:'Step 1!',text:['Read this title.']},{id:'2',attachTo:{element:'.subtitle',on:'right'},buttons:buttonConfig,highlightClass:'highlight',scrollTo:true,cancelIcon:{enabled:true},title:'Step 2!',text:['Read this subtitle.']},{id:'3',attachTo:{element:'.quote',on:'right'},buttons:buttonConfig,highlightClass:'highlight',scrollTo:true,cancelIcon:{enabled:true},title:'Step 3!',text:['Read this cool quote.']}];function Button(){var tour=useContext(ShepherdTourContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button dark",onClick:tour.start,children:"Start Tour"});}function App(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ShepherdTour,{steps:steps,tourOptions:tourOptions,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AppContent,{})]})});}export default App;
